Blackfang: Well, it's not their leader's first time on this planet. 
Megatron already tried to destroy the dormant autobots on this planet 
to prevent the appearance of the maximals.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Nightlight::
> 
> "Why were you chasing them??"said Nightlight"What did they do?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang had a blank expression of both surprise and 
embarassment. 
> He 
> > felt like a jerk, but he wanted to teach Nightlight on these 
> matters.
> > 
> > Blackfang: Oh... I see... Uh... I'm sorry... Well... I'm a 
maximal, 
> > and we are all chasing a predacon criminal and his crew. The 
> autobots 
> > are the ancestors of the Maximals, and the Decepticons are those 
of 
> > the Preds. Personally, I think that all preds are deceitful at 
> least, 
> > and criminals and outlaws most of the time.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > 
> > > Nightlight::
> > > 
> > > Nightlight did a negative movement with her head "Neither I know 
> > what 
> > > mean to be a maximal or a predacon"said sadly Nightlight "Just 
> are 
> > > word for me... I... don't kknow what to say"
> > > 
> > > Nightlight felt in silence,while she looked at Blackfang
